wrapper.node_title: Talking about go out and Greta

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node

preview.p: You look thoghtfull.. Are you really enjoying your time here?

raw.cont: You look thoghtfull.. Are you really enjoying your time here?

preview.p: Kinda.. The city is really beautifull, but I need meet new people..

raw.cont: Kinda.. The city is really beautifull, but I need meet new people..

preview.p: Ow, I see.. I could help... We should go out sometime.. Hey.. there's someone that maybe you could meet..

raw.cont: Ow, I see.. I could help... We should go out sometime.. Hey.. there's someone that maybe you could meet..

preview.p: Her name is Greta. She is really fun and has a colorfull personality. Beside, she is really beautiful.. and best of all: she is single!

raw.cont: Her name is Greta. She is really fun and has a colorfull personality. Beside, she is really beautiful.. and best of all: she is single!

preview.p: Don't get me wrong.. It's been a while she has been lonely. She has just met suckers lately.. and you seem like a good guy. (I'm really good at reading people)

raw.cont: Don't get me wrong.. It's been a while she has been lonely. She has just met suckers lately.. and you seem like a good guy. (I'm really good at reading people)

preview.p: Well, you don't know me so far, but I thank for the good judgement. I think it is a little bit odd, but maybe doesn't harm to try meet her.

raw.cont: Well, you don't know me so far, but I thank for the good judgement. I think it is a little bit odd, but maybe doesn't harm to try meet her.

preview.p: I've been single for a while, so maybe I'll give a shot. What does she look like?

raw.cont: I've been single for a while, so maybe I'll give a shot. What does she look like?

preview.p: Oh, she is really pretty! She is a horse with a blue coat and a long mane..

raw.cont: Oh, she is really pretty! She is a horse with a blue coat and a long mane..

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node

wrapper.node_title: First talk w Nestor just finished

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node
Condition to enter on this node

content.preview: Hey, have you talked to Greta?

raw.cont: Hey, have you talked to Greta?

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node

preview.p: Hey man! Have you met Greta?

raw.cont: Hey man! Have you met Greta?

preview.p: I did talk to her, as you asked me, but it didin't work well...

raw.cont: I did talk to her, as you asked me, but it didin't work well...

preview.p: She didn't like you?

raw.cont: She didn't like you?

preview.p: She has got defensive when I accidentally insinuate that someone told me that she should meet someone

raw.cont: She has got defensive when I accidentally insinuate that someone told me that she should meet someone

preview.p: Oh god..

raw.cont: Oh god..

preview.p: Yes... she had assumed that it was you and dismiss me right away..

raw.cont: Yes... she had assumed that it was you and dismiss me right away..

preview.p: She told me that other people have approach her after talking to you. Is that true?

raw.cont: She told me that other people have approach her after talking to you. Is that true?

preview.p: Oh man, I'm just trying to help her!

raw.cont: Oh man, I'm just trying to help her!

preview.p: It was so embarrassing...

raw.cont: It was so embarrassing...

preview.p: So tell me.. did you like her?

raw.cont: Don't bother about it man..
So tell me.. did you like her?

preview.p: Well, she is really pretty, despite being a little grumpy.

raw.cont: Well, she is really pretty, despite being a little grumpy.

preview.p: She is a great girl! You should try again...

raw.cont: She is a great girl! You should try again...
I don't think so...
ok(53, true)

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node

preview.p: There's something that you can do to impress her. There's a japanese flower that she is looking for a long time.

raw.cont: There's something that you can do to impress her. There's a japanese flower that she is looking for a long time.

preview.p: I think the name is something like 'Radiada'. It's a beautiful flower that looks like a magnificent dove.

raw.cont: I think the name is something like 'Radiada'. It's a beautiful flower that looks like a magnificent dove.

preview.span: a merchant that has just arrived from his usual trips,must have brought one that I ordered.

raw.cont: Mr.
write("{0},", [getEntity('26','last_name')])
a merchant that has just arrived from his usual trips,must have brought one that I ordered.

preview.p: But do you gonna give it to me so I could present her with it?

raw.cont: But do you gonna give it to me so I could present her with it?

preview.p: Exactly! You just have to pay the order invoice. With that thing, you gonna strike her heart big time!

raw.cont: Exactly! You just have to pay the order invoice. With that thing, you gonna strike her heart big time!

preview.p: Ok, I'm gonna find this guy and get it. Wish me luck!

raw.cont: Ok, I'm gonna find this guy and get it. Wish me luck!
Good luck, my man!
g.talked_about_the_flower = true

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node

preview.p: Hi! Im Greta. Im a florist on this town.

raw.cont: Hi! Im Greta. Im a florist on this town.

preview.p: Hi! (Oh, she's actually very preaty..). My name is Nestor. Im new in town.

raw.cont: Hi! (Oh, she's actually very preaty..). My name is Nestor. Im new in town.

preview.p: Oh, I see.. It's preaty colorful ah? I love living here. Look at those flowers! Lovely ah? Do you wanna take a bouquet?

raw.cont: Oh, I see.. It's preaty colorful ah? I love living here. Look at those flowers! Lovely ah? Do you wanna take a bouquet?

preview.p: Oh no... I don't have anybody to give them..

raw.cont: Oh no... I don't have anybody to give them..

preview.p: Well, you could put those flowers on a dinner table, a empty vase.. you know.. to flowrish your home.

raw.cont: Well, you could put those flowers on a dinner table, a empty vase.. you know.. to flowrish your home.

preview.p: I prefer to give them to somebody. If I have luck, I could give them to someone as beautiful as you..

raw.cont: I prefer to give them to somebody. If I have luck, I could give them to someone as beautiful as you..

preview.p: What!? I'm very flattered but, are you flirting with me?

raw.cont: What!? I'm very flattered but, are you flirting with me?

preview.p: Well.. I'm just trying to make a little move here, but I'm not intended to cross any line.. You look like someone that need a little more flowers in your life.

raw.cont: Well.. I'm just trying to make a little move here, but I'm not intended to cross any line.. You look like someone that need a little more flowers in your life.

preview.p: You're funny. Have you seen the amount of flowers that sorrounds me by now? Do I look like somebody that needs more of it?

raw.cont: You're funny. Have you seen the amount of flowers that sorrounds me by now? Do I look like somebody that needs more of it?

preview.p: Well.. a bird tolds me that it could be a good idea. Maybe not flowers.. maybe something else.

raw.cont: Well.. a bird tolds me that it could be a good idea. Maybe not flowers.. maybe something else.

preview.p: And who could possible be this chatty bird?

raw.cont: And who could possible be this chatty bird?

preview.p: Huhh.. I nice new fella that I've met a while ago..

raw.cont: Huhh.. I nice new fella that I've met a while ago..

preview.p: Oh my god, I cannot believe... Does Nestor talk to you? She told you that I am looking for someone? Oh gosh.. I'm gonna kill him!

raw.cont: Oh my god, I cannot believe... Does Nestor talk to you? She told you that I am looking for someone? Oh gosh.. I'm gonna kill him!

preview.p: Oh! Don't be upset! He just trying to help! I'm so sorry..

raw.cont: Oh! Don't be upset! He just trying to help! I'm so sorry..

preview.p: Am I looking desperate these much for help?

raw.cont: Am I looking desperate these much for help?

preview.p: Look man, this is not the first time that he do this thing. I'll go talk about this with him later.. again! What I really need right now is go back to work. Bye.

raw.cont: Look man, this is not the first time that he do this thing. I'll go talk about this with him later.. again! What I really need right now is go back to work. Bye.
Ohh... O..Ok.. nice to meet you...
g.talk_to_greta_01 = true

conditions.title: Condition to enter on this node
Condition to enter on this node

content.preview: May I help you?

raw.cont: May I help you?

content.preview: I came here to apologise.. For me and for Nestor.

raw.cont: I came here to apologise.. For me and for Nestor.

content.preview: He tolds me that you could like this, so I did some stuff and got this for you..

raw.cont: He tolds me that you could like this, so I did some stuff and got this for you..

content.preview: Oh my god! Its a Japanese Radiata! I was wishing this flower for a long time. Thanks so much!

raw.cont: Oh my god! Its a Japanese Radiata! I was wishing this flower for a long time. Thanks so much!

content.preview: You're welcome... I'm glad that you like it..

raw.cont: You're welcome... I'm glad that you like it..

content.preview: I really loved it..... Hey, I'm sorry for my temper last time.. We could grab a coffe if you want to..

raw.cont: I really loved it..... Hey, I'm sorry for my temper last time.. We could grab a coffe if you want to..

content.preview: I would love to!

raw.cont: I would love to!
